#summary Guide of how-to use the Jsigner project and jsigner maven plugin.

= Introduction =

Automating the class diagrams generation is quite simple, you just use the br.com.agile.jsigner.annotations.Domain annotation on the classes that you want to be in the diagram, specifying the diagram name (or names, if the class will appear in multiple diagrams). 


= Details =

First of all, you must configure your settings.xml to include the jsigner maven2 repository.
Use the following URL: 
http://jsigner.googlecode.com/svn/maven2/repository/

Add the following dependency in you project pom.xml for importing the @Domain annotation.

{{{
<dependency>
  <groupId>br.com.jsigner</groupId> 
  <artifactId>jsigner-annotations</artifactId>
  <version>1.0-SNAPSHOT</version>	
</dependency>
}}}
